description: It is a youth management api service that manages the youths

get.description: API endpoint to get the list of Youth profile.A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

post.description: API endpoint to store a Youth profile.A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

get.description: API endpoint to get the specified Youth profile.A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

put.description: API endpoint to update the specified Youth profile.A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

delete.description: API endpoint to delete the Youth profile.A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

get.description: API endpoint to get the list of Skills.A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code
